reviewText: Well being a huge fan of Queen of course I loved it. Freddie Mercury Forever!
I thoroughly enjoy Queen.  Watching this DVD was very nice.  The camera angles were superb.  I recommend it

I like this DVD and recent DVD player can play PAL and NTSC both.
Really excellent Queen's performance during their best day.

I chose this dvd because I totally LOVE Queen!  Freddy Mercury is a totally fancinating and extreme performer!  With such a fantastic voice and stage presence!!!  what a wild man!!

Great dvd!  Great Band!!

I would recommend this dvd to anyone who LOVESgreat c;assoc rock and Great exciting performers!!!
